A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Somehow we are meant to believe that the character of Luke Skywalker\, who kept his cool facing the emperor himself and was not seduced by the dark side\, would even for a split second consider cutting down a young man\, in his sleep\, because he sensed the conflict in him. Luke Skywalker even considering such a cowardice act?

Really Rian\, et al.? Hell no!

And why does Star Wars need to become a platform for serving the political agendas of Disney execs?

If I had to choose one word to describe this pile of mess\, it would have to be abomination.
